        public void setForTransaction​(CardProcessInformation cardProcessInformation)
        Provide payment transaction data for card processing
        Parameters:

      • setForTransactionAndUploadOrder

        public void setForTransactionAndUploadOrder​(CardProcessInformation cardProcessInformation,
                                            UploadOrderInformation orderInformation)
        Provide payment transaction data for card processing and order information for uploading to UpTrillion
        Parameters:
        cardProcessInformation - an instance of CardProcessing Information containing transaction data for card processing
        orderInformation - an instance of UploadOrderInformation containing order information

      • getTransactionInformation

        public TransactionInformation getTransactionInformation()
        Retrieve the transaction information which will be updated before and after the card processing and order uploading
        Returns:
        an instance of TransactionInformation containing the latest updated transaction information through the process.

      • selectAppList

        public void selectAppList​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Accept the Application ID selection(s) from the front end app and return the list to PaymentCardEasyLink SDK for further card processing
        Parameters:
        list - a list of application labels for card processing

      • cancelAppList

        public void cancelAppList()
        Cancel the previous selected AID passed back for the Card process.

      • startCardProcess

        public void startCardProcess​(PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
        Handle card reading process
        Parameters:
        paymentCallback - an instance of PaymentCallback to return process result to calling class   success paymentCallback {"respCode": 0, "respMsg":"Card Payment Success"}
          error paymentCallback {"respCode": -1, "respMsg":"Card Payment Fail"}
          onShowMessage paymentCallback: {"event":"onReportSearchMode","prompts":"PLS Swipe\/Insert\/Tap Card","mode":7}
        {"event":"onReportSearchMode","prompts":"Fallback, PLS swipe card","mode":16}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Detected Card","type":0,"readCardStatus":9}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Read Card SUCCESS","type":0,"readCardStatus":4}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Processing, Not Remove","type":0, "readCardStatus":3}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Please Remove Card","type":0, "readCardStatus":8}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Card Removed","type":0, "readCardStatus":10}
        {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Processing, Not Remove","type":0, "readCardStatus":11}
        {"event":"onSelectApp","prompts":""PLS SELECT APP","timeout":<Milliseconds>, "appList":[Strings],"aidList":[Strings]}
        {"event":"onEnterPin","prompts":"Please Enter PIN","pinlen":<number of digits>,"enterPinEvent":"INIT"}
        Could start transaction after {"event":"onReadCard","prompts":"Read Card SUCCESS","type":0,"readCardStatus":4}

      • cancelCardProcess

        public boolean cancelCardProcess()
        Cancel card process to release card reader resource, or cancel manual transaction
        Returns:
        true if the cancellation is completed successfully; else false.

      • startManualProcess

        public void startManualProcess​(PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
        Start manual entry of card data for card processing   success paymentCallback {"respCode": 0, "respMsg":"Card Payment Success"}
          error paymentCallback {"respCode": -1, "respMsg":"Card Payment Fail"}
          onShowMessage paymentCallback:
        Parameters:
        paymentCallback - an instance of PaymentCallback for delivering result and messages of the card processing back to the calling application

      • startPayment

        public void startPayment​(TransactionInformation transactionInformation,
                         PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
                  throws OnlineException,
                         CommException,
                         java.io.IOException,
                         org.json.JSONException
        Send all transaction data to UpTrillion gateway as well as order information if it is provided via setTransactionAndUploadOrder method.
        Parameters:
        paymentCallback - The interface to return the result in JSON format of the payment process
          • success {"responseCode":"900000","RespMsg":{"<transaction data>"} , "responseMessage":"Success", "responseContent":{"<response data from UpTrillion>"}}
          • error {<failure result in JSON format>}
          • onShowMessage {<message to show in JSON format>}
        Throws:
        OnlineException - error in communicating with UpTrillion gateway
        CommException - error in communicating with UpTrillion gateway
        java.io.IOException - error in parsing the response from UpTrillion gateway
        org.json.JSONException - error in parsing the JSON result

      • sendReceipt

        public void sendReceipt​(java.lang.String traceNumber,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String mobile,
                        PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
                 throws OnlineException,
                        CommException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        org.json.JSONException
        Request UpTrillion to send receipt for the transaction with the specified trace number to customer's phone or email address
        Parameters:
        traceNumber - The trace number to locate the transaction
        email - The customer's email address to receive the receipt
        mobile - The customer's mobile phone number to receive the receipt
        paymentCallback - The interface for receiving the process result
        Throws:
        OnlineException - error in communicating with Uptrillion gateway
        CommException - error in communicating with Uptrillion gateway
        java.io.IOException - error in parsing the response from Uptrilliion gateway
        org.json.JSONException - error in parsing the JSON result

      • getReceipt

        public void getReceipt​(java.lang.String traceNumber,
                       PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
                throws OnlineException,
                       CommException,
                       java.io.IOException,
                       org.json.JSONException
        Retrieve payment receipt details from Uptrillion
        Parameters:
        traceNumber - The trace number to locate the transaction
        paymentCallback - The interface for receiving the process result
        Throws:
        OnlineException - error in communicating with Uptrillion gateway
        CommException - error in communicating with Uptrillion gateway
        java.io.IOException - error in parsing the response from Uptrilliion gateway
        org.json.JSONException - error in parsing the JSON result

      • uploadSignature

        public void uploadSignature​(java.lang.String traceNumber,
                            java.lang.String signData,
                            PaymentCallback paymentCallback)
                     throws OnlineException,
                            CommException,
                            java.io.IOException,
                            org.json.JSONException
        Upload signature points string to Uptrillion. Image point string example: ”209,44^204,41^197,41^154,60^0,65535^”
        Throws:
        OnlineException
        CommException
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
